text:
Ten doses of the #Covid19 vaccine would expire within hours.

Dr. Hasan Gokal says he continues to pay a price for not wasting a #vaccine in a #pandemic. "His voice broke as he counted the toll. He lost his job. His wife struggles to sleep. His children are worried."

#MedTwitter https://t.co/lGxqpII4Ti https://t.co/r7ZHtTFIUX
